definitions.title: vb. Pilp.
definitions.body: etc., hurl, cast (Ar. gt.a0la be extended, elongated; v. Hom:NS 87 who comp. As. tâlu, Aram. t.ayel, [[טַיֵּל]] all walk about (cf. spatiari, fr. spatium); Eth. 0ant’4lala:: hang loosely, 0ant’4l0: expand)—

definitions.title: Pilp.
definitions.body: Pt. [[טְטַלְטֶלְךָ]] [[טַלְטֵלָה גׇ֫בֶר ]] Is 22:17 hurleth thee violently.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֵטִיל]] Jon 1:4; [[וְהֵטַלְתִּ֫י]] Je 16:13, Je 22:26; Impf. [[וַיׇּ֫טֶל]] 1Sa 18:11 (but v. infr.), 1Sa 20:33; [[אֲטִילֶָךָ]] Ez Eze 32:4 (LXX Co om.) [[וַיׇּטִ֫לוּ]] Jon 1:5; [[וַיְטִלֻהוּ]] Jon 1:15; cast, cast out, of casting a javelin ([[חֲנִית]]) 1Sa 18:11 (but rd. here [[וַיִּטׂל]], √ [[נטל]], and took up, so LXX Targum Th We Kp Kit, v. also Dr); 1Sa 20:33 sq. [[על]] pers. aimed at; Jonah [[אֶל־הַיׇּם]] Jon 1:12, Jon 1:15; also the cargo [[כֵּלִים]] Jon 1:5; fig. of ´[[י]] casting Pharaoh [[על־פני השׂדה]] Ez Eze 32:4 (Co del. v. supr.; ‖[[וּנְטַשְׁתִּיךָ בָאָרֶץ]]); hurl (send violently), of ´[[י]] sending furious wind Jon 1:4; fig. of hurling king of Judah, etc. into exile Je 16:3 sq. acc. + [[מעל]] of land from which, and [[על]] of that to which; Je 22:26 c. acc. + [[על]] of land to which.

be hurled, e.g. into exile Je 22:28 (‖[[הֻשְׁלְכוּ]]); hurled down, headlong, [[כִּי יִפּׂל לאׁ יוּטָָל]] Ps 37:24 when he falls he shall not be hurled headlong (fig. of a good man); [[יֻטַָָל]] Job 41:1 be overwhelmed, at sight of the crocodile.
of inanimate thing, be cast, thrown, the lot [[בַּחֵיק יוּטַל אֶת־הַגּוֹרָל]] Pr 16:33.
